comments:
Description:
Exception when render output from report after call setBookmark method.

Steps to reproduce:
Please find attached file in bug #135881
1. Generate attached report to document.
2. Render output throught predefined bookmark.
Codes:
        task = engine.createRenderTask(reportDoc);
        task.setLocale(Locale.ENGLISH);
        task.setAppContext( appContext );
        task.setBookmark(bookmark);
        task.setRenderOption(htmlRenderOptions);
        task.render();
        task.close();

Result:
严重: Can't find the column: COLUMN_5

BTW, at the end, a error dialog poped up, say that there is no disk in the drive, please insert a disk into driver E:
*** Bug 136295 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
This issue is related with the data binding used by the CHART, so postphone to RC1.
This is a bug related with chart query, it's fixed by execute the query on chart.
